archimate:ApplicationInterface.name: IF-00822 MyUWE announcements
archimate:ApplicationInterface.documentation: Syllabus+ (students) and ISIS (staff) data to support myUWE announcements. See IF-00767 for student reps to be included as though they are staff. There is a hierarchy of groups from activity to field of study using data from Syllabus Plus and ISIS. Plus the staff who are entitled to make the announcement (from ISIS).
